system.description:
You have carried the word of your god into more exotic and dangerous places and learned from the experience. You gain the following benefits:

  • You may choose to have the bonus damage done by Hunter’s Target or Trained Accuracy be radiant or necrotic damage when you use those features.
  • When you use Channel Divinity, you regain a use of Trained Accuracy.
  • Half your cleric levels count as ranger levels for the purpose of gaining the Extra Attack feature.
  • You learn Catch Your Breath as a bonus maneuver and it does not count against your maneuvers known.
